products.name: deploy-arch-ibm-watsonx-data
products.label: Cloud automation for watsonx.data
products.short_description: Creates and configures an instance of IBM watsonx.data.
products.long_description: With [IBM watsonx.data](https://www.ibm.com/products/watsonx-data), you can manage and analyze all of your enterprise data, regardless of format, in a unified platform. It's support for open data formats and machine learning libraries makes that data directly accessible for AI workloads.

features.title: Creates a watsonx.data instance
features.description: Get started with watsonx.data by creating and configuring an instance. [Learn more](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/watsonxdata/index.html).

features.title: Encrypts data with IBM Key Protect (optional)
features.description: Use watsonx.data with Key Protect, which encrypts and secures your enterprise data. [Learn more](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/key-protect?topic=key-protect-about).

features.title: Configures Cloud automation for Observability (optional)
features.description: Use watsonx.data with [Cloud automation for Observability](https://cloud.ibm.com/catalog/7a4d68b4-cf8b-40cd-a3d1-f49aff526eb3/architecture/deploy-arch-ibm-observability-a3137d28-79e0-479d-8a24-758ebd5a0eab-global), which provides monitoring and logging capabilities to deliver deep operational insights into your watsonx.data deployment. You can use IBM Cloud Activity Tracker Event Routing to monitor how users and applications interact with watsonx.data, which supports compliance and auditability. Enable IBM Cloud logs to collect, view, and analyze platform logs related to watsonx.data to gain visibility into usage patterns through active tasks and queries. While IBM Cloud Monitoring captures essential metrics such as CPU and memory usage, helping you proactively monitor system performance and resource consumption.

products.support_details: This product is in the community registry, as such support is handled through the originated repo. If you experience issues please open an issue in the repository [here](https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-watsonx-data/issues). Please note this product is not supported via the IBM Cloud Support Center.

iam_permissions.notes: (Optional) Access to configure the IBM Cloud Monitoring instance and logging agents. Required if you're deploying Cloud automation for Observability, which includes IBM Cloud Monitoring.
(Optional) Access to configure an IBM Cloud Logs instance. Required if you're deploying Cloud automation for Observability, which includes IBM Cloud Logs.

dependencies.name: deploy-arch-ibm-account-infra-base
dependencies.description: Cloud automation for account configuration organizes your IBM Cloud account with a ready-made set of resource groups by default. And, when you enable the "with Account Settings" option, it also applies baseline security and governance settings.

dependencies.name: deploy-arch-ibm-kms
dependencies.description: Enable Cloud automation for Key Protect to use your own managed encryption keys. If disabled, IBM Cloud's default service-managed encryption is used.

dependencies.name: deploy-arch-ibm-observability
dependencies.description: Configure IBM Cloud Logs, IBM Cloud Monitoring and IBM Cloud Activity Tracker Event Routing for analyzing logs and metrics generated by the watsonx.data instance.
